step1.commands: cd 1.0_ProdMinBias+ProdMinBias+DIGIPROD1+RECOPROD1; cmsDriver.py MinBias_8TeV_pythia8_TuneCUETP8M1_cff --conditions auto:run1_mc -n 10 --eventcontent RAWSIM --relval 9000,300 -s GEN,SIM --datatier GEN-SIM --beamspot Realistic8TeVCollision --fileout file:step1.root > step1_ProdMinBias+ProdMinBias+DIGIPROD1+RECOPROD1.log 2>&1;

step2.commands: cd 1.0_ProdMinBias+ProdMinBias+DIGIPROD1+RECOPROD1; cmsDriver.py step2 --datatier GEN-SIM-RAW --conditions auto:run1_mc -s DIGI,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:@fake --eventcontent RAWSIM -n 100 --filein file:step1.root --fileout file:step2.root > step2_ProdMinBias+ProdMinBias+DIGIPROD1+RECOPROD1.log 2>&1;

step3.commands: cd 1.0_ProdMinBias+ProdMinBias+DIGIPROD1+RECOPROD1; cmsDriver.py step3 --datatier GEN-SIM-RECO,AODSIM --conditions auto:run1_mc -s RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,EI --eventcontent RECOSIM,AODSIM -n 100 --filein file:step2.root --fileout file:step3.root > step3_ProdMinBias+ProdMinBias+DIGIPROD1+RECOPROD1.log 2>&1;

step2.commands: cd 4.17_RunMinBias2011A+RunMinBias2011A+HLTD+RECODR1reHLT+HARVESTDR1reHLT+SKIMDreHLT; cmsDriver.py step2 --datatier FEVTDEBUGHLT --conditions auto:run1_hlt_Fake -s L1REPACK,HLT:@fake --process reHLT --data --eventcontent FEVTDEBUGHLT -n 100 --filein filelist:step1_dasquery.log --lumiToProcess step1_lumiRanges.log --fileout file:step2.root > step2_RunMinBias2011A+RunMinBias2011A+HLTD+RECODR1reHLT+HARVESTDR1reHLT+SKIMDreHLT.log 2>&1;

step3.commands: cd 4.17_RunMinBias2011A+RunMinBias2011A+HLTD+RECODR1reHLT+HARVESTDR1reHLT+SKIMDreHLT; cmsDriver.py step3 --conditions auto:run1_data_Fake -s RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,EI,PAT,ALCA:SiStripCalZeroBias+SiStripCalMinBias+TkAlMinBias,DQM:@standardDQMFakeHLT+@miniAODDQM --runUnscheduled --process reRECO --data --eventcontent RECO,MINIAOD,DQM --hltProcess reHLT --scenario pp --datatier RECO,MINIAOD,DQMIO -n 100 --filein file:step2.root --fileout file:step3.root > step3_RunMinBias2011A+RunMinBias2011A+HLTD+RECODR1reHLT+HARVESTDR1reHLT+SKIMDreHLT.log 2>&1;

step4.commands: cd 4.17_RunMinBias2011A+RunMinBias2011A+HLTD+RECODR1reHLT+HARVESTDR1reHLT+SKIMDreHLT; cmsDriver.py step4 --data --filetype DQM --conditions auto:run1_data_Fake -s HARVESTING:@standardDQMFakeHLT+@miniAODDQM --scenario pp -n 100 --filein file:step3_inDQM.root --fileout file:step4.root > step4_RunMinBias2011A+RunMinBias2011A+HLTD+RECODR1reHLT+HARVESTDR1reHLT+SKIMDreHLT.log 2>&1;

step5.commands: cd 4.17_RunMinBias2011A+RunMinBias2011A+HLTD+RECODR1reHLT+HARVESTDR1reHLT+SKIMDreHLT; cmsDriver.py step5 --conditions auto:run1_data_Fake --filein file:step3.root -s SKIM:all --data --scenario pp --secondfilein filelist:step1_dasquery.log -n 100 --fileout file:step5.root > step5_RunMinBias2011A+RunMinBias2011A+HLTD+RECODR1reHLT+HARVESTDR1reHLT+SKIMDreHLT.log 2>&1;
